description:
Roads cost 3 Move Points instead of 5.



Units gain Fast Embark and while embarked they gain Very Fast Movement on the World Map.
name: Advanced Logistics

description: <hyperlink>Special Province Improvements</hyperlink> grant +5 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink>.
name: Specialist Districts

description: Completing a <hyperlink>Province Annexation</hyperlink> summons an Animal <hyperlink>Unit</hyperlink> under your control, depending on the province.
name: Wild Expansion

description:
Founding or Absorbing Cities takes -2 turns.

Newly Founded or Absorbed Cities gain +1 Population.
name: Fruitful Integration

description: Increase the <hyperlink>City Cap</hyperlink> by +1<citytier></citytier>.
name: Expanded Governance

description: Unlocks the ability for <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> to <hyperlink.GLOBAL.ExcavationConcept>Excavate</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Earthen</hyperlink> terrain in the <hyperlink>Underground</hyperlink>.
name: Excavation

description:
Unit can build roads on the World Map. Most terrain costs 6-8 Move Points while roads cost 5.



Road Building can be enabled in the Army panel. Roads are built on hexes along which the Army moves and cost 3 Gold per hex.
name: Road Building

description: Unlocks the ability for <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> to embark and use vessels to cross the water, and for Flying and Floating units to travel over water.
name: Basic Seafaring

description: Gain +3 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> per <hyperlink>Unit Tier</Hyperlink> of the <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> killed in <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>.
name: Battlefield Looting

description: Defeating an Infestation grants you a unit based on the Infestation defeated.
name: Call of Chaos

description: Gain +10<caststrategic></caststrategic><casttactical></casttactical> Casting Points.
name: Wizard King

description:
Your units gain +20 Morale at the start of any Combat where their side is defending.

Your Cities suffer no economic penalties while under Siege.
name: Indomitable Defenders

description: Gain <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> whenever your <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> gain Ranks.<bulletlist><bullet><medalIron></medalIron>Soldier grants +10<knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet><bullet><medalBronze></medalBronze>Veteran grants +20<knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet><bullet><medalSilver></medalSilver>Elite grants +30<knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet><bullet><medalGold></medalGold>Champion grants +40<knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet><bullet><medalPlatinum></medalPlatinum>Legend grants +50<knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink></bullet></bulletlist>
name: Philosopher Soldiers

description: Gain +1 <whisperingStone></whisperingStone> <hyperlink>Whispering Stone</hyperlink>.
name: Diplomatic Focus

description:
Vassals gain +1 Allegiance Levels when first Vassalized.

Converting conquered Cities into Vassals takes -1 Turn.
name: Benevolent Conquerors

description: Each city in your Empire loses -1 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink>, but immediately summons 3 <hyperlink>Tier</hyperlink> I <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of the Last Stand

description:
Immediately reveal the full World Map.

Your Throne City gains infinite Sensing Range.

Armies in Sensing Range reveal their numbers and allegiance.
name: Spying Shadows

description: Your <hyperlink>Armies</hyperlink> regenerate +10 <hyperlink><hp></hp> Hit Points</hyperlink> per <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> in Hostile <hyperlink>Domain</hyperlink>.
name: Dark Vigor

description:
Your Units gain Universal Camouflage in your Domain.

Your Cities gain +4 Vision Range.
name: Shadow Domain

description: Gain +10 <optactical></optactical> <hyperlink> Combat Casting Points</hyperlink> per unit death or kill in combat.
name: Death Magic

description:
Razing Cities takes -2 Turns less.

Razing Cities yields +50 Gold per Population.

Gain a Unit tier 3 Unit of the razed city's culture.
name: Reign of Destruction

description: When you win in battle, you have a 25% chance of gaining a Tier I or II unit that can be produced in a city.
name: Lure of the Horde

description: Your <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> gain +2 <hyperlink>Vision Range</hyperlink> and +3 <hyperlink>Sensing Range</hyperlink>.
name: Advanced Sensing

description: Unlocks the ability for your <hyperlink>Armies</hyperlink> to use <hyperlink>Forced March</hyperlink>.
name: Forced March

description:
Cities can now build Teleporters.



Outposts can build teleporters in a province they annex through a Work Camp.
name: Teleporter Infrastructure

description: All your <hyperlink>Heroes</hyperlink> instantly gain +1 Rank.
name: Rite of the Exalted

description: Gain the <hyperlink>Cryptblade</hyperlink> hero item.
name: Rite of the Cryptblade

description: Immediately conjure a defended <hyperlink>Magic Material</hyperlink> near each <hyperlink>City</hyperlink> in your <hyperlink>Empire</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Conjuration

description: All currently active <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> permanently gain +1 <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink> and +1 <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of the Dreadnought

description: All your <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> instantly regain all <hyperlink><hp></hp> Hit Points</hyperlink> and non-<hyperlink>Hero</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> gain +1 Rank.
name: Rite of Enduring Duty

description:
Call a Rally of the Lieges event, where you may recruit units at no cost.

Gain +10 Recruitment Points.
name: Rite of the Banners

description: Gain +1 <hyperlink>Siege Project</hyperlink> slot.
name: Siege Specialization

description: The movement cost of embarking is reduced while Embarked <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> gain Very Fast Movement.
name: Advanced Seafaring

description: Your <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> gain +500 <unitprod></unitprod> <hyperlink>Draft</hyperlink> this <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Chosen Warriors

description: Your <hyperlink>Throne City</hyperlink> loses -1 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink> but immediately summons a <hyperlink>Balor</hyperlink> with Power from Slaughter.
name: Rite of Possession

description: Immediately summon an <hyperlink>Army</hyperlink> of Magic Origin <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> with Low Maintenance at your <hyperlink>Throne City</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of the Astral Summons

description: Gain the <hyperlink>Breastplate of the Champion</hyperlink> hero item.
name: Rite of the Armorer

description: Instantly gain +20 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> for each <hyperlink>Province</hyperlink> in your empire's <hyperlink>Domain</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Awakening

description: Instantly gain +750 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Forbidden Knowledge

description: Your <hyperlink>Vassals</hyperlink> grant +10% more resources in tribute.
name: Master of Houses

description:
Recruiting Units during the Rally of the Lieges costs -50% Gold.

Time between Rallies of the Lieges is reduced by -5 Turns.
name: House Levies

description: Your <hyperlink>Heroes</hyperlink> gain <hyperlink><xp></xp> Experience</hyperlink> 200% faster.
name: Exalted by Shadows

description:
Gain the ability to assign Whispering Stones to other empires' Vassals to gain their tribute.

Gain +1 Whispering Stone.
name: Court of Whispers

description: Gain +200 <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink> and +200 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> upon completing conquest of a city.
name: Stolen Power

description: Magic Origin <hyperlink>Unit Upkeep</hyperlink> is reduced by -20%.
name: Shadow Binding

description:
Free Cities with a Whispering Stone assigned instantly provide you with Vision Range.

Free Cities or Vassals with a Whispering Stone assigned grant you +15 Knowledge.
name: All-Seeing

description: Instantly gain +20 <hyperlink><allegiance></allegiance>Allegiance</hyperlink> with all <minorcity></minorcity><hyperlink>Free Cities</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Allegiance

description: Instantly summon a bandit <hyperlink>Army</hyperlink> under your control to your <hyperlink>Throne City</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of War

description: Instantly gain +1000 <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Astral Abundance

description: Instantly gain +2000 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Wealth

description: Immediately summon a <hyperlink>Spirit Wolf</hyperlink> with Guardian Spirit and Resurgence at your <hyperlink>Throne City</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of the Guardian Spirit

description: All <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> in your <hyperlink>Empire</hyperlink> instantly gain +1 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink>.
name: Rite of Expansive Growth

description: Units of Legendary Rank gain a buff depending on their unit type.<bulletlist><bullet>Shield Units gain Order of the Unbreakable.</bullet><bullet>Polearm Units gain Order of the Tyrantslayer.</bullet><bullet>Shock Units gain Order of the Thunderer.</bullet><bullet>Skirmisher Units gain Order of the Windborne.</bullet><bullet>Support Units gain Order of the Soulwarden.</bullet><bullet>Battle Mage Units gain Order of the Warmage.</bullet><bullet>Ranged Units gain Order of the Titanslayer.</bullet><bullet>Fighter Units gain Order of the Berserker.</bullet><bullet>Mythic Units gain Order of the Indomitable.</bullet></bulletlist>
name: Knightly Orders

description: Shock Units, Shield Units, and Polearm Units gain <hyperlink><xp></xp> Experience</hyperlink> +30% faster.
name: Career Soldiers

description: <hyperlink>Vassals</hyperlink> grant +10 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> in tribute.
name: Tributaries

description: Destroying an <hyperlink>Infestation</hyperlink> or Conquering a <minorcity></minorcity><hyperlink>Free City</hyperlink> grants a stacking +300 <hyperlink>Relations</hyperlink> to all other <minorcity></minorcity><hyperlink>Free Cities</hyperlink> for 10 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turns</hyperlink>.
name: Pacification

description: Your <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> regenerate an additional +1 <hyperlink><hp></hp> Hit Point</hyperlink> per 2 <hyperlink>Move Points</hyperlink> they have remaining at the end of your <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink>.
name: Resourceful Vigor

description: <mine></mine> <hyperlink>Mines</hyperlink> grant +5 <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink>.
name: Arcane Artisans

description: <hyperlink>Special Province Improvements</hyperlink> cost -25% <structureprod></structureprod> <hyperlink>Production</hyperlink> and -25% <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> to build.
name: Provincial Architects

description: The <hyperlink>Throne City</hyperlink> and <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> that share a border with the Throne City gain +10% in all types of income.
name: Metropolitan Society

description:
Gain +1 Siege Project slot.

Siege Projects cost -25% less.
name: Siege Masters

description: <hyperlink>Province Improvements</hyperlink> grant +1 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink> for each adjacent <hyperlink>Province Improvement</hyperlink> of the same type.
name: Consolidated Industry

description:
Outposts cost -25% Gold less.

Founding and upgrading Outposts takes -1 Turn.
name: Military Engineering

description: Newly summoned or recruited Magic Origin <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> gain +1 Ranks.
name: Astral Binding

description:
Units are restored to full Hit Points and regain 50% of their Move Points after using a Teleporter if they have not yet regained any Move Point this turn.

Teleporters grant +15 Mana income.
name: Teleportation Mastery

description: Casting a <hyperlink>Combat Spell</hyperlink> reduces the cost of all other <hyperlink>Combat Spell</hyperlink> types by -25% for 2 <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turns</hyperlink>.
name: Surge Spellcasting

description: Your <hyperlink>Throne City</hyperlink> gains +10 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> for each <hyperlink>Magic Material</hyperlink> your Empire has access to.
name: Ingredient Experimentation

description:
Research Posts grant +5 Knowledge.

Conduits grant +5 Mana.
name: Focused Studies

description: Whenever a new <hyperlink>Research</hyperlink> Skill is researched, the <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> cost of another random Skill is reduced by -25%.
name: Astral Inspiration

description: Gain 150 <knowledge></knowledge><hyperlink>Knowledge</hyperlink> per <hyperlink>Hero</hyperlink> defeated in combat.
name: Knowledge Extraction

description: <hyperlink>Unit Upkeep</hyperlink> is reduced by -10% per Rank that unit has.
name: Martial Ancestry

description: <hyperlink>City Structures</hyperlink> cost -20% less <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> to build.
name: Master Masons

description: <hyperlink>Spells</hyperlink> can now be cast on the first <turn></turn> Turn of <hyperlink>Combat</hyperlink>.
name: Quickening

description: <teleporter></teleporter> <hyperlink>Teleporter</hyperlink> and <spelljammer></spelljammer> <hyperlink>Spell Jammer</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Province Improvements</hyperlink> grant +10 <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink> Income.
name: Mana Extraction

description:
Locking and Shuffling Research Skills costs -50% less.

Research City Structures cost -25% less Gold and Production to build.
name: Adaptive Research

description: Gain +20 more <casusBelli></casusBelli> <hyperlink>Grievances</hyperlink> against players with an opposing <hyperlink>Alignment</hyperlink>.
name: Justified Wars

description: <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> recruited through <hyperlink>Rally of the Lieges</hyperlink> gain +2 Rank upon recruitment.
name: Exemplar

description: Gain +1 <whisperingStone></whisperingStone> <hyperlink>Whispering Stone</hyperlink>.
name: Diplomatic Channels

description: Your <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> grant +100% more <food></food> <hyperlink>Food</hyperlink>.
name: Druidic Empire

description: Movement cost for friendly <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> in your <hyperlink>Domain</hyperlink> is reduced by -2 <hyperlink>Move Points</hyperlink>.
name: Rangers

description: <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> gain +3 <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink> for each <hyperlink>Resource Node</hyperlink> in their <hyperlink>Domain</hyperlink>.
name: Druidic Care

description: <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> may expand to <hyperlink>Provinces</hyperlink> located +2 <hyperlink>Province</hyperlink> further from the center.
name: Expansive Reach

description:
Coast, River, and Water Provinces grant +2 Food.

Rivers count as roads for the purposes of movement for your units.
name: Expert Sailors

description: <hyperlink>Provinces</hyperlink> with the Forest <hyperlink>Province Feature</hyperlink> grant +2 <happiness></happiness> <hyperlink>City Stability</hyperlink>.
name: Natural Order

description: Your units regenerate an additional +15 <hyperlink><hp></hp> Hit Points</hyperlink> per <turn></turn> <hyperlink>Turn</hyperlink> in friendly <hyperlink>Domain</hyperlink>.
name: Natural Recovery

description: <farm></farm> <hyperlink>Farms</hyperlink> grant +5 <food></food> <hyperlink>Food</hyperlink>.
name: Soiltenders

description: <hyperlink>Razing</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> yields +20 <gold></gold> <hyperlink>Gold</hyperlink> permanent income.
name: Spoils of Destruction

description:
+30 Grievances against all other Empires. These cannot be traded or lost.

Gain +50 Gold and +50 Mana per active War you are involved in.
name: Destined Conquerors

description: <hyperlink>Razing</hyperlink> <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> grants +1 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink> to one of your <hyperlink>Cities</hyperlink> for every 3 <population></population> <hyperlink>Population</hyperlink> of the city that was razed.
name: War Slaves

description: <hyperlink>Forced March</hyperlink> costs -75% less <mana></mana> <hyperlink>Mana</hyperlink> and inflicts -75% less damage to your <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink>.
name: Tireless Marchers

description: <hyperlink>Tier</hyperlink> I <hyperlink>Units</hyperlink> gain <hyperlink><xp></xp> Experience</hyperlink> +50% faster.
name: Impressment

description:
Pillaging a Province takes -1 turns and yields +20% more rewards.

Pillaging Units are healed for +20 Hit Points.
name: Skilled Raiders

description: Gain +20<optactical></optactical> <hyperlink> Combat Casting Points</hyperlink> and <caststrategic></caststrategic> <hyperlink>World Map Casting Points</hyperlink>.
name: Casting Reserves
